snippet.title: Speaking Simulator 2018 Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Talk to us! https://www.twitter.com/SpeakingSim

Speaking Simulator, the awkwardly hilarious physics game about a robot struggling to infiltrate human society using nothing but a prototype tongue and lips to have conversations. 

More: 
https://www.affablegames.com

Speaking Simulator will be available in English in 2019.
